status_available.account.updated: Occurs whenever an account status or property has changed.
status_available.account.application.authorized: Occurs whenever a user authorizes an application. Sent to the related application only.
status_available.account.application.deauthorized: Occurs whenever a user deauthorizes an application. Sent to the related application only.
status_available.account.external_account.created: Occurs whenever an external account is created.
status_available.account.external_account.deleted: Occurs whenever an external account is deleted.
status_available.account.external_account.updated: Occurs whenever an external account is updated.
status_available.application_fee.created: Occurs whenever an application fee is created on a charge.
status_available.application_fee.refunded: Occurs whenever an application fee is refunded, whether from refunding a charge or from refunding the application fee directly. This includes partial refunds.
status_available.application_fee.refund.updated: Occurs whenever an application fee refund is updated.
status_available.balance.available: Occurs whenever your Stripe balance has been updated (e.g., when a charge is available to be paid out). By default, Stripe automatically transfers funds in your balance to your bank account on a daily basis.
status_available.billing_portal.configuration.created: Occurs whenever a portal configuration is created.
status_available.billing_portal.configuration.updated: Occurs whenever a portal configuration is updated.
status_available.capability.updated: Occurs whenever a capability has new requirements or a new status.
status_available.charge.captured: Occurs whenever a previously uncaptured charge is captured.
status_available.charge.expired: Occurs whenever an uncaptured charge expires.
status_available.charge.failed: Occurs whenever a failed charge attempt occurs.
status_available.charge.pending: Occurs whenever a pending charge is created.
status_available.charge.refunded: Occurs whenever a charge is refunded, including partial refunds.
status_available.charge.succeeded: Occurs whenever a charge is successful.
status_available.charge.updated: Occurs whenever a charge description or metadata is updated.
status_available.charge.dispute.closed: Occurs when a dispute is closed and the dispute status changes to lost, warning_closed, or won.
status_available.charge.dispute.created: Occurs whenever a customer disputes a charge with their bank.
status_available.charge.dispute.funds_reinstated: Occurs when funds are reinstated to your account after a dispute is closed. This includes partially refunded payments.
status_available.charge.dispute.funds_withdrawn: Occurs when funds are removed from your account due to a dispute.
status_available.charge.dispute.updated: Occurs when the dispute is updated (usually with evidence).
status_available.charge.refund.updated: Occurs whenever a refund is updated, on selected payment methods.
status_available.checkout.session.async_payment_failed: Occurs when a payment intent using a delayed payment method fails.
status_available.checkout.session.async_payment_succeeded: Occurs when a payment intent using a delayed payment method finally succeeds.
status_available.checkout.session.completed: Occurs when a Checkout Session has been successfully completed.
status_available.checkout.session.expired: Occurs when a Checkout Session is expired.
status_available.coupon.created: Occurs whenever a coupon is created.
status_available.coupon.deleted: Occurs whenever a coupon is deleted.
status_available.coupon.updated: Occurs whenever a coupon is updated.
status_available.credit_note.created: Occurs whenever a credit note is created.
status_available.credit_note.updated: Occurs whenever a credit note is updated.
status_available.credit_note.voided: Occurs whenever a credit note is voided.
status_available.customer.created: Occurs whenever a new customer is created.
status_available.customer.deleted: Occurs whenever a customer is deleted.
status_available.customer.updated: Occurs whenever any property of a customer changes.
status_available.customer.discount.created: Occurs whenever a coupon is attached to a customer.
status_available.customer.discount.deleted: Occurs whenever a coupon is removed from a customer.
status_available.customer.discount.updated: Occurs whenever a customer is switched from one coupon to another.
status_available.customer.source.created: Occurs whenever a new source is created for a customer.
status_available.customer.source.deleted: Occurs whenever a source is removed from a customer.
status_available.customer.source.expiring: Occurs whenever a card or source will expire at the end of the month.
status_available.customer.source.updated: Occurs whenever a source’s details are changed.
status_available.customer.subscription.created: Occurs whenever a customer is signed up for a new plan.
status_available.customer.subscription.deleted: Occurs whenever a customer’s subscription ends.
status_available.customer.subscription.pending_update_app: Occurs whenever a customer’s subscription’s pending update is applied, and the subscription is updated.
status_available.customer.subscription.pending_update_exp: Occurs whenever a customer’s subscription’s pending update expires before the related invoice is paid.
status_available.customer.subscription.trial_will_end: Occurs three days before a subscription’s trial period is scheduled to end, or when a trial is ended immediately (using trial_end=now).
status_available.customer.subscription.updated: Occurs whenever a subscription changes (e.g., switching from one plan to another, or changing the status from trial to active).
status_available.customer.tax_id.created: Occurs whenever a tax ID is created for a customer.
status_available.customer.tax_id.deleted: Occurs whenever a tax ID is deleted from a customer.
status_available.customer.tax_id.updated: Occurs whenever a customer’s tax ID is updated.
status_available.file.created: Occurs whenever a new Stripe-generated file is available for your account.
status_available.identity.verification_session.canceled: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession is canceled.
status_available.identity.verification_session.created: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession is created.
status_available.identity.verification_session.processing: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession transitions to processing.
status_available.identity.verification_session.redacted: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession is redacted.
status_available.identity.verification_session.requires_i: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession transitions to require user input.
status_available.identity.verification_session.verified: Occurs whenever a VerificationSession transitions to verified.
status_available.invoice.created: Occurs whenever a new invoice is created. To learn how webhooks can be used with this event, and how they can affect it, see Using Webhooks with Subscriptions.
status_available.invoice.deleted: Occurs whenever a draft invoice is deleted.
status_available.invoice.finalization_failed: Occurs whenever a draft invoice cannot be finalized. See the invoice’s last finalization error for details.
status_available.invoice.finalized: Occurs whenever a draft invoice is finalized and updated to be an open invoice.
status_available.invoice.marked_uncollectible: Occurs whenever an invoice is marked uncollectible.
status_available.invoice.paid: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt succeeds or an invoice is marked as paid out-of-band.
status_available.invoice.payment_action_required: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt requires further user action to complete.
status_available.invoice.payment_failed: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt fails, due either to a declined payment or to the lack of a stored payment method.
status_available.invoice.payment_succeeded: Occurs whenever an invoice payment attempt succeeds.
status_available.invoice.sent: Occurs whenever an invoice email is sent out.
status_available.invoice.upcoming: Occurs X number of days before a subscription is scheduled to create an invoice that is automatically charged—where X is determined by your subscriptions settings. Note: The received Invoice object will not have an invoice ID.
status_available.invoice.updated: Occurs whenever an invoice changes (e.g., the invoice amount).
status_available.invoice.voided: Occurs whenever an invoice is voided.
status_available.invoiceitem.created: Occurs whenever an invoice item is created.
status_available.invoiceitem.deleted: Occurs whenever an invoice item is deleted.
status_available.invoiceitem.updated: Occurs whenever an invoice item is updated.
status_available.issuing_authorization.created: Occurs whenever an authorization is created.
status_available.issuing_authorization.request: Represents a synchronous request for authorization, see Using your integration to handle authorization requests.
status_available.issuing_authorization.updated: Occurs whenever an authorization is updated.
status_available.issuing_card.created: Occurs whenever a card is created.
status_available.issuing_card.updated: Occurs whenever a card is updated.
status_available.issuing_cardholder.created: Occurs whenever a cardholder is created.
status_available.issuing_cardholder.updated: Occurs whenever a cardholder is updated.
status_available.issuing_dispute.closed: Occurs whenever a dispute is won, lost or expired.
status_available.issuing_dispute.created: Occurs whenever a dispute is created.
status_available.issuing_dispute.funds_reinstated: Occurs whenever funds are reinstated to your account for an Issuing dispute.
status_available.issuing_dispute.submitted: Occurs whenever a dispute is submitted.
status_available.issuing_dispute.updated: Occurs whenever a dispute is updated.
status_available.issuing_transaction.created: Occurs whenever an issuing transaction is created.
status_available.issuing_transaction.updated: Occurs whenever an issuing transaction is updated.
status_available.mandate.updated: Occurs whenever a Mandate is updated.
status_available.order.created: Occurs whenever an order is created.
status_available.order.payment_failed: Occurs whenever an order payment attempt fails.
status_available.order.payment_succeeded: Occurs whenever an order payment attempt succeeds.
status_available.order.updated: Occurs whenever an order is updated.
status_available.order_return.created: Occurs whenever an order return is created.
status_available.payment_intent.amount_capturable_updated: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has funds to be captured. Check the amount_capturable property on the PaymentIntent to determine the amount that can be captured. You may capture the PaymentIntent with an amount_to_capture value up to the specified amount. Learn more about capturing PaymentIntents.
status_available.payment_intent.canceled: Occurs when a PaymentIntent is canceled.
status_available.payment_intent.created: Occurs when a new PaymentIntent is created.
status_available.payment_intent.payment_failed: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has failed the attempt to create a payment method or a payment.
status_available.payment_intent.processing: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has started processing.
status_available.payment_intent.requires_action: Occurs when a PaymentIntent transitions to requires_action state
status_available.payment_intent.succeeded: Occurs when a PaymentIntent has successfully completed payment.
status_available.payment_link.created: Occurs when a payment link is created.
status_available.payment_link.updated: Occurs when a payment link is updated.
status_available.payment_method.attached: Occurs whenever a new payment method is attached to a customer.
status_available.payment_method.automatically_updated: Occurs whenever a payment method’s details are automatically updated by the network.
status_available.payment_method.detached: Occurs whenever a payment method is detached from a customer.
status_available.payment_method.updated: Occurs whenever a payment method is updated via the PaymentMethod update API.
status_available.payout.canceled: Occurs whenever a payout is canceled.
status_available.payout.created: Occurs whenever a payout is created.
status_available.payout.failed: Occurs whenever a payout attempt fails.
status_available.payout.paid: Occurs whenever a payout is expected to be available in the destination account. If the payout fails, a payout.failed notification is also sent, at a later time.
status_available.payout.updated: Occurs whenever a payout is updated.
status_available.person.created: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is created.
status_available.person.deleted: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is deleted.
status_available.person.updated: Occurs whenever a person associated with an account is updated.
status_available.plan.created: Occurs whenever a plan is created.
status_available.plan.deleted: Occurs whenever a plan is deleted.
status_available.plan.updated: Occurs whenever a plan is updated.
status_available.price.created: Occurs whenever a price is created.
status_available.price.deleted: Occurs whenever a price is deleted.
status_available.price.updated: Occurs whenever a price is updated.
status_available.product.created: Occurs whenever a product is created.
status_available.product.deleted: Occurs whenever a product is deleted.
status_available.product.updated: Occurs whenever a product is updated.
status_available.promotion_code.created: Occurs whenever a promotion code is created.
status_available.promotion_code.updated: Occurs whenever a promotion code is updated.
status_available.quote.accepted: Occurs whenever a quote is accepted.
status_available.quote.canceled: Occurs whenever a quote is canceled.
status_available.quote.created: Occurs whenever a quote is created.
status_available.quote.finalized: Occurs whenever a quote is finalized.
status_available.radar.early_fraud_warning.created: Occurs whenever an early fraud warning is created.
status_available.radar.early_fraud_warning.updated: Occurs whenever an early fraud warning is updated.
status_available.recipient.created: Occurs whenever a recipient is created.
status_available.recipient.deleted: Occurs whenever a recipient is deleted.
status_available.recipient.updated: Occurs whenever a recipient is updated.
status_available.reporting.report_run.failed: Occurs whenever a requested ReportRun failed to complete.
status_available.reporting.report_run.succeeded: Occurs whenever a requested ReportRun completed succesfully.
status_available.reporting.report_type.updated: Occurs whenever a ReportType is updated (typically to indicate that a new day’s data has come available).
status_available.review.closed: Occurs whenever a review is closed. The review’s reason field indicates why: approved, disputed, refunded, or refunded_as_fraud.
status_available.review.opened: Occurs whenever a review is opened.
status_available.setup_intent.canceled: Occurs when a SetupIntent is canceled.
status_available.setup_intent.created: Occurs when a new SetupIntent is created.
status_available.setup_intent.requires_action: Occurs when a SetupIntent is in requires_action state.
status_available.setup_intent.setup_failed: Occurs when a SetupIntent has failed the attempt to setup a payment method.
status_available.setup_intent.succeeded: Occurs when an SetupIntent has successfully setup a payment method.
status_available.sigma.scheduled_query_run.created: Occurs whenever a Sigma scheduled query run finishes.
status_available.sku.created: Occurs whenever a SKU is created.
status_available.sku.deleted: Occurs whenever a SKU is deleted.
status_available.sku.updated: Occurs whenever a SKU is updated.
status_available.source.canceled: Occurs whenever a source is canceled.
status_available.source.chargeable: Occurs whenever a source transitions to chargeable.
status_available.source.mandate_notification: Occurs whenever a source mandate notification method is set to manual.
status_available.source.refund_attributes_required: Occurs whenever the refund attributes are required on a receiver source to process a refund or a mispayment.
status_available.source.transaction.created: Occurs whenever a source transaction is created.
status_available.source.transaction.updated: Occurs whenever a source transaction is updated.
status_available.subscription_schedule.aborted: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled due to the underlying subscription being canceled because of delinquency.
status_available.subscription_schedule.canceled: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is canceled.
status_available.subscription_schedule.completed: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is completed.
status_available.subscription_schedule.created: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is created.
status_available.subscription_schedule.expiring: Occurs 7 days before a subscription schedule will expire.
status_available.subscription_schedule.released: Occurs whenever a new subscription schedule is released.
status_available.subscription_schedule.updated: Occurs whenever a subscription schedule is updated.
status_available.tax_rate.created: Occurs whenever a new tax rate is created.
status_available.tax_rate.updated: Occurs whenever a tax rate is updated.
status_available.topup.canceled: Occurs whenever a top-up is canceled.
status_available.topup.created: Occurs whenever a top-up is created.
status_available.topup.reversed: Occurs whenever a top-up is reversed.
status_available.transfer.created: Occurs whenever a transfer is created.
status_available.transfer.paid: Occurs after a transfer is paid. For Instant Payouts, the event will typically be sent within 30 minutes.
status_available.transfer.reversed: Occurs whenever a transfer is reversed, including partial reversals.
status_available.transfer.updated: Occurs whenever a transfer’s description or metadata is updated.
